block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Career Education Corp., Hoffman Estates, Ill., 2.2 million shares. CS First Boston.
Evercel Inc., Danbury, Conn., 1.5 million shares. Harkness.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Career Education Corp., Hoffman Estates, Ill., 2.2 million shares. CS First Boston.
Evercel Inc., Danbury, Conn., 1.5 million shares. Harkness.
Orchid BioSciences Inc., Princeton, N.J., an initial public offering of 8 million shares. CS First Boston.
Sonic Innovations Inc., Salt Lake City, an initial public offering of 3.6 million shares. Goldman, Sachs.
Trintech Group P.L.C., Dublin, 6 million American depositary shares, each ads represents half of an ordinary share. Deutche Bank Alex. Brown.

Wherever.net Holding Corp., Hong Kong, an initial public offering of 4.5 million shares, offered as American depositary shares or shares. Each ads represents 1 share, 2.3 million in the U.S. and 2.3 million international. Merrill Lynch & Co.
